channel.description: YouTube Video Good API Design There are many articles online that discuss best practices in API design. For this project, we’re going to follow a few of the most common recommendations: API Versioning Proper Naming Conventions Proper HTTP Methods Proper HTTP Status Code Responses Let’s start with the first one - we can easily add a version number to our API’s URL paths. This allows us to make breaking changes to the API in the future without breaking any of the current functionality.
